about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community-developed project that helps you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work of Doki Doki Literature Club! and is not affiliated with Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as defined by Team Salvato's IP Guidelines.
about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager does not take responsibility for any damage caused to your files or computer, as a result of playing a mod or otherwise. It is up to you to ensure mods are safe to play.

mods.tab_subtitle: Which mod do you want to play next?
